Name: 魔物的迷宫探险
About the game: This is a maze adventure game. Collect rewards in the maze and unlock changeable demons to further explore and lock the maze. WSAD operation, click the mouse to select the attack mode. Collect Magic Mushroom rewards in the maze, Exchange rewards for magic objects Turn into a demon to further explore the maze.
